locutie.beschrijving: The sermon explores the Incarnation through the lens of Advent darkness, W.H. Auden's poetry, Nicene dogma, and the confession of Thomas.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. Detailed focus on the Greek 'iota' (homoousia), the 'O' Antiphons, and the narrative structure of John's Gospel.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily teaching and explaining the significance of Christ's identity, transitioning to a blessing/promise at the conclusion.
voorbeelden: I’m going to say something now that might cause you to drift off.
This argument was settled at Nicaea.
Thomas’s confession is the pinnacle of Christian faith.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: Intellectual assent to the divinity of Christ and comfort in the midst of doubt.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Low. The Spirit is not explicitly mentioned as the agent of faith; the focus is on the 'written' word and the 'Lord's blessing'.

voorbeelden: It was very exciting to be invited.
The Advent season offers something remarkable.
Auden is audaciously describing the central mystery.
Stay with me for a minute.
Listen to him speaking directly to you.
Recall that Thomas’s confession of faith is the summary.
I’ve loved Cooperstown for many years.
I yearned to feel at home here.
I assure you that I am a doubter myself.
He promises his own self to us.
The God and Father... be with you always.
commissieven.kwaliteit: The promises are mostly 'talked about' in the third person until the very end.

declaratieven.autoriteit: The preacher acts as a teacher/witness rather than a sacramental officer until the final blessing.

indicatoren: Historical explanation of the Council of Nicaea.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes an observer of a theological lecture rather than a participant in a divine encounter.

performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Faith is treated as a response to information rather than a gift created by the word.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: Strong at the end, but delayed by significant preamble.
voorbeelden: He promises his own self to us, to those who have not seen but yet put their trust in him.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Personal anecdotes and homiletical signposting ('I am going to say').

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Direct address appears primarily in the final three paragraphs.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used to apply the blessing of Jesus to the current congregation.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Dominant mode. Talking about Thomas, Auden, Nicaea, and 'the church'.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a historical and literary distance between the text and the hearer.

actueel_present.gebruik: The 'now' of the service and the final blessing.

voorbeelden: The Infinite has become a finite fact... He promises his own self to us... that you may believe.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: The pattern is present but the Assertive phase is disproportionately long.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: These are written [so] that you may believe... and that believing you may have life.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions primarily as a high-level theological and literary orientation. It 'talks about' the miracle of the Incarnation with great skill but waits until the very end to 'perform' the promise.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The truth about the salvation of the human race hung by an iota.
sterke_punten.effect: Establishes the high stakes of the dogma.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Extensive quotes from Auden and historical background on Nicaea.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It becomes an event in the final moments when the preacher bridges the gap between Thomas and the congregation.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The sermon is more of a 'testimony to' the sacrament of the Word than the 'administration' of it.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Implicitly, through the reading of the promise of Jesus.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: The preacher acts as an usher/teacher rather than a herald.
tekstueel_bewijs: Listen to him speaking directly to you.

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: The effect is attributed to the 'written' words and the 'Lord's blessing'.
tekstueel_bewijs: These are written [so] that you may believe.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Partially. The sermon aims to bestow 'life in his name'.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Yes, in the description of the 'Daystar'.
tekstueel_bewijs: Out of the unrelieved darkness of death, the Daystar arises.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Shift from 'Auden writes' and 'Nicaea settled' to 'Christ comes' and 'I announce to you'.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: The argument was settled at Nicaea.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Tonight, the Church declares to you: this child is your God.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from historical fact to present declaration.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is quoted as a historical text rather than spoken as a present reality.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Use the first person of the mandate.
voorbeeldzinnen: On behalf of Christ, I promise you: though you have not seen, you are blessed.
Christ comes to you, Christ Church Cooperstown, in your specific darkness.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The balance is actually good, just too descriptive.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Keep the indicative, but make it performative.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A beautiful, intellectually stimulating sermon that successfully anchors faith in dogma, but could gain 'event-character' by reducing the literary commentary in favor of direct proclamation.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SAT identifies that the preacher isn't just sending a 'message' about God, but that the words themselves (the blessing) are intended to be the vehicle of God's action.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The focus is not on the beauty of the Auden quotes (rhetoric), but on whether the preacher successfully 'promises' (commissive) Christ to the hearer.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that despite the high-quality locution, the sermon remains largely assertive (talking about) until the final 10%.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: The Infinite has become a finite fact.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: High for teaching, low for encounter.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: He promises his own self to us.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: The turning point of the sermon.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a masterpiece of 'talking about' the mystery, but the 'sacramental event' is compressed into the very end.
